8.11 DUIM-Gadgets Module

gadget-popup-menu-callback-setter

Generic function

Summary

Sets the popup menu callback of the specified gadget.

Signature

gadget-popup-menu-callback-setter 
                          popup-menu-callback gadget 
=> popup-menu-callback

Arguments

popup-menu-callback

An instance of type <function>.

gadget
An instance of type <gadget>.

Values

popup-menu-callback

An instance of type <function>.

Library

duim-gadgets

Module

duim-gadgets

Description

Sets the popup menu callback of gadget to function. The function should typically create a menu of commands suited to the context in which the function is called. The function is generally invoked by right-clicking on the gadget.

See also

gadget-popup-menu-callback, page 574

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
